backend/main.mo: Empty backend actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables using OKLCH colors with light/dark mode and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, wraps app with ThemeProvider, SiteLayout, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedPageCont: Wrapper providing fade and slide-up animations when page content changes.
frontend/src/components/ContourBackgroun: Fixed low-opacity contour background layer covering the entire viewport.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Responsive footer with branding, quick links, contact info, hours, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky responsive header with desktop and mobile navigation using shadcn/ui components.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Shared page layout combining background, header, animated container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/three/CafeContro: Overlay UI for 3D scene providing help card, reset button, and toggleable instructions.
frontend/src/components/three/CafeRoomSc: Three.js scene rendering a cafe room with animated steam, lighting, furniture, and camera controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and session state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, animations, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page displaying the caf√© story, highlights, and values using styled components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with input fields, validation, toast feedback, and contact info layout.
frontend/src/pages/ExportDownloadPage.ts: Page with UI elements for downloading a static export zip, including package details and a download trigger.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing an interactive 3D cafe scene with a hero section and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Menu page that renders categorized food and drink items using card-based layout and icons.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, animations, fonts, and container settings for the site's theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, features, requirements, and current site state.
